title: Ground News - Nature Coast Volunteer Center hosting MLK Healthy Food Drive
text: Nature Coast Volunteer Center hosting MLK Healthy Food Drive Local food pantries often find their stock of non-perishable food items depleted after the holidays. The Nature Coast Volunteer Center and AmeriCorps Seniors RSVP will be holding a food drive in honor of Martin Luther King, Jr., who once asked,… Summary by Chronicle Online More Filters Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] Chronicle Online Nature Coast Volunteer Center hosting MLK Healthy Food Drive Local food pantries often find their stock of non-perishable food items depleted after the holidays.
